H0.text: Acura is the luxury division of what major automaker. Toyota

H1.text: Acura is the luxury division of what major automaker. Ford

H2.text: Acura is the luxury division of what major automaker. Nissan

H3.text: Acura is the luxury division of what major automaker. 本田

A4.text: Honda was the first Japanese automobile manufacturer to release a dedicated luxury brand, Acura, in March 1986.

A5.text: Honda introduced the successful Acura brand to the American market in an attempt to gain ground in the luxury vehicle market.
